[vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”4″ top_padding=”5″ bottom_padding=”3″ back_color=”color-208400″ back_image=”4950″ back_position=”center center” overlay_color=”color-183305″ overlay_alpha=”84″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_empty_space empty_h=”1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_font=”font-384419″ text_size=”h1″ text_color=”color-xsdn” sub_lead=”yes” subheading=”AMLive™ Detects Unauthorized Broadcasts Over Your Live Streaming Service”]Protect Live Televised Events from Being Restreamed[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”5″ bottom_padding=”5″ back_color=”color-144234″ overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ row_name=”monetization”][vc_column column_width_percent=”90″ position_horizontal=”left” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ sticky=”yes” width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text_size=”h3″]Stop Unauthorized Restreaming of Live Programming  [/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]Automatically identify and manage unauthorized streaming of live events over your streaming platform, such as subscription-based sports channels, award shows and pay-per-view events.

AMLive sets the high industry standard for recognition of live content: highly accurate identification with no false positives, preserving the user experience and avoiding unnecessary DMCA takedowns.   

AMLive helps your platform meet the requirements of the 2019 EU Copyright Directive.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_visibility=”yes” medium_width=”0″ mobile_visibility=”yes” mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”4803″ media_width_percent=”100″ shape=”img-round” radius=”std” shadow=”yes” shadow_weight=”xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”5″ top_padding=”4″ bottom_padding=”4″ back_color=”color-208400″ back_image=”4513″ back_position=”center bottom” overlay_color=”color-183305″ overlay_alpha=”53″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_font=”font-384419″ text_size=”h1″ text_color=”color-xsdn” sub_lead=”yes”]Automated & Immediate Content Identification [/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading text_size=”h5″ text_color=”color-xsdn”]Because broadcasters provide Audible Magic direct live feeds, AMLive can detect restreamed content as the event is in progress.  Broadcasters are provided a dash board to register and manage their events, including setting specific business rules.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”5″ bottom_padding=”5″ back_color=”color-144234″ overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ row_name=”rights”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_horizontal=”left” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ radius=”std” shadow=”yes” shadow_weight=”sm”][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”90″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ sticky=”yes” width=”2/3″][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ desktop_visibility=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1566678788046{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”5″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″]AMLive Handles Audio and Video Changes in Restream[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]AMLive’s robust identification technology can handle the many challenges that occur with unauthorized rebroadcasts. Often these rebroadcasts contain audio and video distortions, degradations or changes.

Designed to handle these issues, AMLive can identify video without audio and audio without video. For example, the service will identify a video clip of a sports event without the audio or a completely different audio track.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”5″ top_padding=”4″ bottom_padding=”4″ back_color=”color-208400″ back_image=”4513″ back_position=”center bottom” overlay_color=”color-183305″ overlay_alpha=”53″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_font=”font-384419″ text_size=”h1″ text_color=”color-xsdn” sub_lead=”yes”]Learn more about using AMLive.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_button button_color=”color-445744″ size=”btn-lg” radius=”btn-circle” hover_fx=”full-colored” border_width=”0″ link=”url:%2Fcontact%2F|title:Blog||”]Learn More[/vc_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]
